CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Email_Domain__c)) , HYPERLINK("https://erp.xometry.com/quotes-orders?start=0&length=50&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=4&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=desc&search%5Bsearch%5D="+ Email_Domain__c +"&n_columns=" + $Label.Orders_Datatable_Column_Length ,"Go to this Account's Orders in the ERP", "_blank"), "No Email Domain Provided for This Account")
CustomField.label: ERP Company Orders
